alert.note: Alert for Kimble (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 25 at 3:36AM CDT until September 25 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western and central Kimble County in west central Texas... * Until 430 AM CDT. * At 335 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles north of Roosevelt, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roosevelt around 340 AM CDT Junction around 425 AM CDT Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Cleo. This includes Interstate 10 between Mile Markers 438 and 459. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
